Text:
only 38 MB because  the format is .mov (that's what I had) 
Linux users: plays on Totem Movie Player,  codecs in Debian/Ubuntu repositories

This is the last video shot by Indimedia journalist Brad Will, killed in Oaxaca, Mexico.

I got this video from Democracy Player hzzp://getdemocracy com (dot intead of space and t for z)
I recommend you get it and subscribe the Democracy Now channel, each day a long detailed news report, mostly about the war, civil rights, politics, etc
 democacynow org
